name: Escape Is Just The Beginning
description:
Player and International drivers try to pass the challenges to win, the game idea is almost addicted because no one win until the finish line and when your opponents become in front of you don't worry because they may get attack so you become the first, the game include :-

* 11 Super Sport Cars Models
* 9 Shining Customization Colors
* 4 Customization Feature per Handling
* 2 Circuits and up to 5 Play modes
* War Environment Helicopters, F-16 and Angry Soldiers are the most active challenges plus you opponents in the race.
* International Player Joined your race Quickly according to the time of your race.
* The game completely Free with 100,000$ Budgets to get what you want regarding your car.

Thank you and enjoy it.
